verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: disinvited] [ARG1: the entire Philadelphia Eagles team] [ARG2: from attending a White House ceremony on Tuesday] .
